summary.purpose: Provides SVG icon factory functions for table UI controls including sort arrows, filter indicators (empty and slashed), and an export-to-Excel button icon.
summary.problem_solved: Encapsulates table-related SVG icons as parameterized JSX-returning functions, supporting visual states like sort direction, filled/outline filter indicators, and customizable dimensions for consistent table header controls.

symbols.name: sortSvg
symbols.description: Returns a JSX element rendering a white downward-pointing arrow/chevron SVG icon used for table column sort indicators. When upside_down is true, the icon is rotated 180 degrees to point upward.

parameters.name: upside_down
parameters.description: When true, rotates the arrow 180 degrees to indicate ascending sort order.

details.rendered_ui_description: A 13x13 white arrow/chevron SVG icon positioned absolutely with Tailwind classes (top-[3px] left-1). Points downward by default; rotated 180 degrees when upside_down is true.

symbols.name: emptyFilterSvg
symbols.description: Returns a JSX element rendering a white funnel/filter SVG icon for table column filter controls. Supports two visual variants: a solid filled funnel or an outline-only funnel.

parameters.name: solid
parameters.description: When true, renders a solid filled funnel icon; when false or undefined, renders an outline/stroke funnel icon.

details.rendered_ui_description: A 13x13 white funnel/filter SVG icon. In solid mode, the funnel is completely filled. In outline mode, the funnel shows only the border/outline. Both variants use white (#fff) fill.

symbols.name: slashFilterSvg
symbols.description: Returns a JSX element rendering a white funnel/filter SVG icon with a diagonal slash through it, indicating a disabled or cleared filter state. Supports solid and outline variants with customizable color.

parameters.name: solid
parameters.description: When true, renders a solid filled slashed funnel icon; when false or undefined, renders an outline slashed funnel icon.

parameters.name: color
parameters.description: Custom fill color for the SVG paths. Defaults to '#fff' (white) when not provided.

details.rendered_ui_description: An 18x20 SVG icon showing a funnel with a diagonal line/slash through it, wrapped in a div with negative top and right margins (mt-[-4px] mr-[-2px]). Indicates that filtering is disabled or cleared. Both solid and outline variants available.

symbols.name: exportToExcelSvg
symbols.description: Returns a JSX element rendering a white document-with-download-arrow SVG icon representing an export-to-Excel action. Accepts optional width, height, and viewBox parameters for sizing.

details.rendered_ui_description: An 18x18 white SVG icon depicting a document/spreadsheet with a downward arrow, representing an export-to-Excel action. The icon shows a file outline with a folded corner and an 'X' character (for Excel), plus a download arrow at the bottom right.
